long description: Unlimited Local/STD Idea to Idea Mobile calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.10/min will be applicable.  -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
200 local/STD mobile mins. Upto 280 local/STD mobile mins subject to time of recharge by customer
